modShortDescription: Mod that modifies the claw hammer block damage to 20000 damage to one shot items. Would recommend for PVE servers.
modDescription:
Mod that modifies the claw [hammer](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) block damage to 20000 damage to one shot items. Would recommend for PVE servers.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1MneUxnCeuVGzA-2JlAnAq4ELTBatKcCV?usp=sharing)**
